channel.title: 317 server
channel.description:
Every 317 server nowadays is all filled with customs, dungeoneering items and spirit shields and all based around money. I remember playing some 317's about 3 years ago, but I can't remember exactly everything.
So my point now is, I want to make a 317 server like it was done 2-3 years ago. But I would need some ideas on it, and what source would be the best (I was thinking about allstar).
Appreciate it if someone could help me.

item.title: 317 server
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

My Idea actually wasn’t to remake runescape, it was to remake the old runescape 317 servers.

I found a source, I remember it was the first source I downloaded when trying to code RSPS’s. It also has one of the parts I remember being the home of a 317 server 2 years ago.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

Here’s the 3 sources I’ll suggest you.

[ul][li]iClarity[/li]
[li]rs377d[/li]
[li]RuneSource[/li][/ul]

Why: Superior then then Delta, then PI…

I don’t know nothing, really nothing about allstars, because I never played one, and I never coded a server based off allstar.
It’s up to you.

Give a try getting back the good gold times.

Read full topic
